mapper.select: select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, c.name category_name, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, jput.place_id, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no inner join jeju_place_user_theme jput on jput.theme_no = t.theme_no where public = 1 and place_id= #{placeId} order by t.theme_no

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.category_no, c.name category_name, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no=c.category_no left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no inner join jeju_user u on t.user_no=u.user_no where t.theme_no=#{no} order by t.theme_no
